item.description:
SOLD OUT!! well maybe. Add yourself to the wait list. More beds may open later in the month.

We will host 3 Contest this weekend:
1. Pumpkin carving - byop
2. Best Costume
3. Best Treat

Halloween Weekend is a special tradition at the Wedeln Ski House.  Our 20 room, 150 year old house has inspired many ghost stories and it is an ideal place to spend Halloween.  This weekend may sell out (yes 70+ people will be up) so get your reservations in early.  

For a full details of the planned event please sign up.  Most guests will arrive Friday night so arrive early to meet everyone. night  Saturday morning we may do a moderate hike if the weather is good or you stay at the house as we transform our place into a true haunted house.

Cost to stay at the house is $20per person, per night, 21+ only.  Due to the high demand we may require prepayment.  I will let you know when we get closer to the Halloween.
item.name: Halloween Weekend at The Wedeln Ski House
